question: K-9 Journal, which was recently released, is associated with which field?
explanation:
Union Home Minister Amit Shah released the inaugural issue of the National Police K-9 Journal in New Delhi.
It is the Indiaâ€™s first such publication on the subject of Police Service K9s, which is the name given for Police Dogs. A special Police K9 Cell was set up in November 2020. The biannual journal will be released in April and October, with sections in Hindi and English.
